import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { Disclosure, Menu, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useToken } from '../context/TokenProvider' function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } export default function Navbar() { const [open] = useState(false) const { clearToken } = useToken() const handleLogout = () => { clearToken() } return (
